verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Delight yourself in the Lord
And He will give you the desires of your heart,
Delight yourself in the Lord
And He will give you the desires of your heart.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
My delight, Lord, is in You,
I delight in knowing You;
My delight, Lord, is in You,
I delight in knowing You.
